resources.string:
Our services include all health care requirements, home nursing, home care, elder care, child care, newborn care at home, and home nursing. We also doing physiotherapy sessions for the elderly, brain trauma, muscle fatigue, postoperative and rehabilitation 

We provide the suitable care for the patient according to the instructions of the doctor in terms of doses, dates, type of treatment and method of implementation of treatment without any change, only after consulting the doctor and received orders doctor in a clear manner 

We have a specialized nursing team of both sexes (males and females) as well as various technical categories of nursing specialists and nursing assistants
